sentence: Their attentiveness and quick response to the needs of our event staff and individuals from all over the world
Our room rate included daily breakfast buffet the food is phenominal very nice spread service is impeccable
The rooms are nice and so is the staff
The bellmen belwomen if there are any of the latter is responsive and kind if one desires to have such things as golf clubs brought to ones room or other frivolities
We were given absolutely great service both before and after our visit from the Concierge desk specifically Joan
but staff was friendly and food was good
On a more positive note every person on the staff was nice from valet to front desk to room service
Great location food service and ambience
The hotel is gorgeous and the staff is really wonderful
The staff was great and the hotel was clean and quiet
2nd visit in a month for a work related sesion great service food and environment
Their complimentary shuttle service within a 3 mile radius of the hotel is great too as it is pretty isolated

When i initially checked in I was not happy bc i was unaware of the renovation but after i expressed my initial first impression the hotel staff manager was extremely professional and made my stay a very exceptional experience
Upon our late night arrival on day 1 the front desk agent checked us in with an assigned room on the first level
After receiving less than helpful service from the 1 80 agent I contacted the hotel directly and they could not have been more professional and understanding
The lobby of the hotel the grounds the service are all 5 STARS
Staff is young and they really do n’t care IMHO
And what ’s worse everytime they tried to make up for the poor service they whiffed on that as well
Guess they thought we would just “ go away ” so headed to front desk again another clerk said we do n’t have anything
Today we live in such a world where customer service is waning so to actually be gifted with exceptional individuals was for me the highlight of my stay
Ordered room service for breakfast and it never showed up

women really justify calling a security guardIt was insulting to be rudely treated by a clearly inexperienced and poorly trained hotel employee and the experience has affected my overall view of the Omni Resort
What a sweetheart and so above and beyond any service I ’ve ever received at a hotel
I must say they seem to have gotten their wheels well oiled by year end overall operations and the staff were great
Though I really focused on Tesia on this review due to her amazing service the rest of the staff at this hotel was great as well
Front desk not very attentive while I stood in front of her she took 3 different phone calls and never acknowledged my presence
That was interesting but now I am literally begging the front desk to bring my materials that I shipped to the hotel in advance
